ygData.subject: Re: Does NEAT always lead to higher fitness value?
ygData.msgSnippet: a) The actual experiment is addressed (i.e. not proposed). b) Yes, on all problems addressed to date. c) Yes, digest the meaning/implications in the data

a) The actual experiment is addressed (i.e. not proposed).
b) Yes, on all p=
roblems addressed to date.
c) Yes, digest the meaning/implications in the d=
ata supplied.

The task of evolving/optimizing a "pre-evolved" supervisor g=
enome is 
ongoing. Capturing supervisor experience will be important in the=
 
process of developing/insuring broad applicability to diverse 
experiment=
s.
